ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
bzip2:
- '1'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
fortran_compiler:
- gfortran
fortran_compiler_version:
- '14'
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - cxx_compiler_version
  - fortran_compiler_version
zlib:
- '1'
zstd:
- '1.5'

about.description:
HepMC3 is a new rewrite of HepMC event record. It uses shared pointers
for in-memory navigation and the POD concept for the persistency.
about.summary: HepMC3 is a new rewrite of HepMC event record.

name: hepmc3

about.description:
HepMC3 is a new rewrite of HepMC event record. It uses shared pointers
for in-memory navigation and the POD concept for the persistency.
about.summary: HepMC3 is a new rewrite of HepMC event record.

about.description:
HepMC3 is a new rewrite of HepMC event record. It uses shared pointers
for in-memory navigation and the POD concept for the persistency.
about.summary: HepMC3 is a new rewrite of HepMC event record.

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: HepMC3
  version: 3.3.1

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://hepmc.web.cern.ch/hepmc/releases/${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 08240160b0f28dc3293aa4d61ce65e2d67cd597acf6faca439f2e46625f7e793
  target_directory: source
  patches:
    - 0001-Fix-cmake4-find_file.patch

build:
  number: 4
  skip: win
  dynamic_linking:
    overdepending_behavior: ignore  # Ignore until python <=3.12 is dropped
    overlinking_behavior: error

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - cmake
    - make
  host:
    - python
    - zlib
    - bzip2
    - zstd
  run:
    - python
  run_exports:
    - ${{ pin_subpackage(name|lower, upper_bound='x.x') }}
  ignore_run_exports:
    from_package:  # cmake looks for these but doesn't use them
      - zlib
      - bzip2
      - zstd

tests:
  - files:
      source:
        - source/test
    requirements:
      run:
        - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
        - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
        - ${{ compiler('fortran') }}
    script:
      - HepMC3-config --prefix
      - HepMC3-config --cxxflags
      - HepMC3-config --ldflags
      - HepMC3-config --libdir
      - cd source/test
      - "${CXX} -std=c++11 testMass.cc -o testMass $(HepMC3-config --cxxflags --ldflags) -Wl,-rpath,\"$(HepMC3-config --libdir)\""
      - ./testMass

about:
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_file: source/COPYING
  summary: HepMC3 is a new rewrite of HepMC event record.
  description: |
    HepMC3 is a new rewrite of HepMC event record. It uses shared pointers
    for in-memory navigation and the POD concept for the persistency.
  homepage: https://hepmc.web.cern.ch/hepmc/
  repository: https://gitlab.cern.ch/hepmc/HepMC3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - henryiii
    - chrisburr
    - gartung
    - matthewfeickert
    - kratsg
    - lgray
    - meiyasan
    - scarlehoff
